title: Kiseki Chapter 2
overview: Miracle…It might just be spiritual anchor for someone but in this Fall foliage time in Japan, it becomes a time for love that blooms in their hearts. Four leaf clover is going to be a symbol of good memories for them in Kiseki, Season of Miracle. Four leaf clovers are said to stand for faith, hope, love, and luck.The park in Tokyo is filled with fresh atmosphere of nature in the fall season, P sits and wait for his friend Beboy take a picture and having fun with his first time in Japan; he hasn't been aboard before. In this traveling, they accidentally meet two guys, twins named Pan and Plai that come to Japan in different objective. By the time they meet and are getting closer, they have learned a lot about meaning of life. In a short time, six days, many things happened and filled some things in their hearts, in the end their time together is running out, but their memories still remain in their hearts and their feelings will continue.
